msg: Added ModifyDN specific handling pathways on referrals for dealing with the
newSuperior when it is a referral or has a referral ancestor.  In these cases
we're following section 5.6.2 of RFC 3296 here:

author: akarasulu
msg: added handling to better detect differences between move, rename and

author: akarasulu
msg: o Move and Move+Rename operations were not properly setting the DN of the
target entry being moved even though indices were being properly updated.
Fixed by adding entry update with dn change.  This is due to switch from
Attributes to ServerEntry where the ServerEntry contains the DN.
o Fixed some hanging cursors and some unnecessary code.
-This line, and those below, will be ignored--

author: jsdelfino
msg: Convert localhost to the actual local host name when configuring Widget proxies otherwise you get security exceptions in the browser, even though localhost and your local host name point to the same address.
